thread.title: Spider-Man is swinging into Disneyland as part of the new Marvel Super Hero HQ attraction - Movies
thread.title_full: Spider-Man is swinging into Disneyland as part of the new Marvel Super Hero HQ attraction - Movies News - Digital Spy

author: Justin Harp
title: Spider-Man is swinging into Disneyland as part of the new Marvel Super Hero HQ attraction - Movies
text: Spider-Man is set to swing into Disneyland for its brand new Marvel attraction.When the Anaheim, CA theme park unveils Super Hero HQ in November, park visitors will be able to get an autograph from their friendly neighborhood web-slinger as part of a specially-designed Spider-Man exhibit. © DisneyDisney's new Spider-Man costume Complete with a redesigned costume from Disney, Spider-Man will be available to greet fans, pose for photos and recount his legendary battles with the likes of Kraven the Hunter, Vulture and Mysterio.The addition of Spider-Man to Super Hero HQ comes as Marvel Studios integrates Peter Parker into its blockbuster cinematic universe.In the Heart of the Sea's Tom Holland will debut as a teenage version of the character in next year's Captain America: Civil War, before getting his own solo film. © Rex Features / Can Nguyen/Marvel Comics Super Hero HQ is housed in Disneyland's historic Tomorrowland Expo Centre to give visitors the ultimate Marvel experience.Guests can cross the treacherous Bifrost of Asgard with the help of Thor, virtually try on a set of Tony Stark's Iron Man armour and visit Stark Industries' Hall of Armour.Disney's Anaheim park is also soon to break ground on its Star Wars Land, a whole new series of attractions being constructed to fit in with the revived Lucasfilm franchise.There's no unveiling date yet for Star Wars Land, but the Marvel Super Hero HQ opens to the public on November 16.
